fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Monopoly: If you survive to see the end of the game, you will become the only winner (barring players that have already met their win condition). You win with nobody except Outsider Destructives/Outsider King.
- Foreclosure: At the start of D4, or when a faction is one death away from victory, everyone will be notified that there is a Mountebank. You gain 2 non-special cards of your choice in this case. If neither of these conditions are met and a faction would normally win, your victory will be extended by *1 phase*, and everyone will be notified that there is a Mountebank. 
- Rich: Whenever a room requires card points to use, you hold 2 card points available for spend. 
- Investment: Whenever you trade cards, you will gain the cards you traded away at the start of the next phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Banker: Gain a non-special card of your choice. Gain a use every 3 people you outlive. [2 uses, 1 CD. Recharging, 0/3] 
- Disguise: Appear as a different role for the rest of the phase. [3 uses]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to see the end of the game.
